context_bundle.content:
Vertical Slice architecture pattern.

Concept:
Organize by feature, not by layer. Each feature contains all its layers.

Structure:
/features
  /create-order
    - CreateOrderHandler.cs
    - CreateOrderRequest.cs
    - CreateOrderValidator.cs
  /get-order
    - GetOrderHandler.cs
    - GetOrderQuery.cs

Benefits:
- Feature isolation
- Easier to understand single feature
- Reduced coupling between features
- Simpler refactoring

Trade-offs:
- Some code duplication
- Cross-cutting concerns need patterns
- Less code reuse
